name: Eden's Promise: Anamorphosis
content:
• Bound of Faith + LIGHTNING DRAGON: massive DoT needs constant healing
  • Burnt Strike: line AOE in middle of arena
    • FIRE DRAGON: large knock back
    • LIGHTNING DRAGON: much wider than telegraph
    • LIGHT DRAGON: stack for AoE circles after
  • Turn of the Heavens: circles matching the dragon will have larger AOEs
  • Shifting Sky: two clones will sequentially cast line AOEs with additional effects:
    • FIRE DRAGON: large knock back
    • LIGHTNING DRAGON: much wider than telegraph
  • Prismatic Deception: when the boss vanishes, run around the edge of the arena to find the invisible clones, avoid the three-line AoEs from these
